author: Cat Clifford
title: Look inside the hospital in China where coronavirus patients were treated by robots
description: Beijing-based robotics company CloudMinds sent robots to Chinese hospitals to help with the treatment of patients with coronavirus to limit the spread of the infection. Here's a look inside.
content:
The idea of humanoid robots taking jobs previously done by humans may feel dystopian, but in the midst of the global COVID-19 pandemic, robots can free up human hospital medical staff and limit the possibility virus spread.
That's precisely why Beijing-based… [+3130 chars]
